MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am to repair a fault on our underground cable network at Station Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:52am on the 20th of November 2020.
